the generation

we convey warm regards on behalf of the

people
allow us to congratulate you Mr
President on your election
we wish to express our solidarity with

for the recent and painful loss of life

at that historic moment when Humanity
having defeated Fascism and Nazism
envisioned the creation of a space where
dialogue among all states would prevail
from which we could build global
stability and cooperation on the pillars

18 years ago our commander Hugo Chavez
stated on this stage
I quote the United Nations has exhausted
its model and is not simply a matter of
reform
the 21st century demands profound
changes that can only be achieved
through a restructuring of this
organization and a quote
painful as it is to acknowledge this
statement remains relevant the United
Nations has not fulfilled its
foundational purpose
and we now face even more serious
challenges
the United Nations has not managed to
overcome the unilateralism of countries
that by reproducing Colonial and
Imperial logics
seek to assert themselves above the
principles enshrined in this
organization's founding Charter
the solution to the new and complex
challenges facing Humanity today cannot
be achieved without consolidating
inclusive multilateralism the
democratization of international
relations and a true multipolar system
today we see how many agencies programs
and funds of the United Nations system
fail to fulfill their mandates
and end up being instrumentalized by the
interests of the United States of
America and its allies
we must reform the organization to make
it a democratic institution where all
members have a voice and participate in
decision making on equal terms
it is essential to return to the
practice of consensus including within
this General Assembly which presupposes
ending the zero-sum mentality
and instead promoting a win-win vision
that allows us to effectively address
Collective interests through cooperation
tolerance and understanding
it is equally necessary to advance with
the reform of the security Council to
correct historical imbalances and
provide greater representation to our
mother Africa in that important body
the United Nations cannot continue to
operate as it is
how many more resolutions must this
General Assembly adopt to put an end
once and for all to the criminal
blockade against our sister Cuba
how many more resolutions must this
General Assembly or the security Council
itself whose decisions are legally
binding approve for the rights of
Palestine to be truly respected as a

we wonder how many more Summits will be
necessary to confirm the non-compliance
with commitments made particularly in

how much more time must pass for us to
realize that under the current system it
is impossible to achieve the goals we
have set for ourselves
since the year 2000 when we agreed on
the now extinct Millennium development
goals
no less than 30 Summits convened by the
United Nations have taken place
it is crucial to move forward without
further delay regarding the reform of
the International Financial architecture
including the governance and
decision-making methods of the Bretton
Woods institutions
which served the interests of a minority
of wealthy countries and they also
politicize them to exert pressure and
domination over Sovereign Nations
the restructuring of the United Nations

our peoples were victims of the crimes
of colonization and slavery
but just future is only possible if
reparations are made
for the recognition Justice and
development of historically affected

we also reiterate our strong support for

respectively
as well as for the historoic peoples of

with whom we firmly stand in their just

the government of the United States of
America believing itself to be the
Sovereign of our continent
under the pretext of the illegal Monroe

of this controversy lies in the

the imperialist aggression was
fraudulently imposed by the powers of
the time in 1899.

American Empire
which seeks to lead us into a war over

the bolivarian Republic of Venezuela
reaffirms its commitment to peace but

its sovereignty and territorial
territorial integrity

the regulation of new information

regulation that prevents the

our country has serious and legitimate

to reclaim the founding Spirit of the

racist
discriminatory and xenophobic Trends
must be unequivocally rejected these

whilst these phenomena have their main

50 years ago a just man who dared to

with double standards those who claim to

activate mechanisms of political

we demand his immediate release
this type of persecution jeopardizes the

from the U.N we call on all countries to

exacerbates the current Global crisis

mentality in internal international

let us measure how much has been

we express our concern at the rapid

reaching levels unseen in recent
Generations
this is then a new and alarming arms

we support the proposal of Colombian

we are confident that this will create a

we actively participate in the

convinced that the achievement of total

coercive measures against a third of
humanity
the so-called sanctions violate all

these measures are applied precisely by

they are also a deliberate attack on the

an impediment to the achievement of the

which has been discussed so much
throughout this week
these illegal measures have created a

relations
and we demand their complete immediate

it is unacceptable for our peoples who

therefore we cannot endorse any

pivotal issue for the lives and
existence
of hundreds of millions of human beings
how much our countries could improve the

capacities based on our vast potential
the bolivarian Republic of Venezuela

these illegal measures have caused Great

232 billion dollars
steep drop in our GDP and the

including 31 tons of gold seized by the

not even the covid-19 pandemic was

today we Face a new generation of more

turning these atrocities into true

the United Nations High Commission of

Venezuela demands the complete immediate

commercial and financial blockades to
which Venezuela Cuba Eritrea Iran

which have successfully navigated these

we thank

this demonstrates that Venezuela has

these results achieved through our own

we have been are and will always be a
